name: 80s Japanese Idol Hairstyle ( Akina Nakamori )
description:
Buy me a coffee if you enjoy using my model :) thx u very much

Another 80s Japanese idol second to Seiko Matsuda at that time.

She got such very cute face and I feel in love with her since I found her while browsing for 80s songs in Youtube few year back.

But yeah, actually she has same hairstyle as Seiko, but a bit longer.

80s Japanese Idol Hairstyle ( Akina Nakamori )

Trigger Word : akinanakamori

Weight : 0.5-0.8

Make sure to set Denoising Strength around 0.3-0.4 or the face will melt...

Tested with some Realistic + Anime model and it's looking good.

Hope you enjoy my models!
